title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing excessively. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be fixed.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing excessively.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
1. Run the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing excessively.
